title: Custom Fields Global Setting
content:

 Jump to: 
navigation
, 
search
The 
Custom Fields
 setting on the 
Global Settings
 page allows you to view and edit all 
Custom Fields
 within your 
instance
, including those found within a 
Universal Tracking Application
.
 
 Retrieved from ‘
https://wiki.smartsimple.com/index.php?title=Custom_Fields_Global_Setting&oldid=30119
’ 
Category
: 
Global Settings
